name: You Can't Take Our King This Early On
text: Counter: Give your leader or up to one of your characters +3000 power for this battle. Then, reveal the top card of your deck and play up to one cost 3 or less character with {Whitebeard Pirates} included in its types. Place the remaining on the top or bottom of your deck.
